description: The newly updated BelleTour was developed for high peaks, big lines, pillow popping, and everything in between. This application of our biobased Algal Core and Algal Wall in a split provides symbiosis between you and your big mountain pursuits. A wider waist, slight swallowtail, and medium sidecut integrate to create a shape that floats and planes as well as it pivots. Designed to optimize stiffness and performance for both touring and descending, you’ll be tagging lines no matter the conditions.
name: Belletour (Split) Camber 23/24

specs.value: Stiffer nose and tail to reduce tip and tail chatter with a medium flex between stance for energy transfer edge to edge. Increased core profile height under touring brackets for stable uphill travel
Algal Core - Vertically laminated, domestically sourced aspen with 4 algal polyurethane foam stringers, tip to tail
Algal Wall - Seamless semi cap Algal PU sidewall. Designed to increase damping and stability
Spark R&D latches and clips. Fixie clips, top-mount
5mm directional camber with early rise nose
